name: regen-api
description: An api for generating react apps and staging on s3 bucket

scripts.deploy: claudia create --version dev --region us-east-1 --role regen-lambda-execution-role --api-module app
scripts.hello: claudia create --version dev --region us-east-1 --role regen-lambda-execution-role --handler lambda.handler --deploy-proxy-api

author: Dario Thornhill <dariothornhill@gmail.com>
